data.title: Liquid Level Gauges
data.meta_description: Manufacturers of Quality Storage Tank Equipment Since 1898
data.text:
The RA model tank gauge is a regular gauge with an aluminum float. This gauge is ideal for all petroleum based products. The #20RA Tokheim Gauge consists of 12" diameter welded aluminum float, stainless steel measuring tape (graduated in feet, inches, and eighths), housings, elbows, reading section, base, counterweight, brackets, tank clamps, and all essential fittings. Light weight aluminum parts save shipping costs and make gauges much easier to install. Detailed instructions for installing are included with each shipment. Standard pipe and installing not included.

The RS model tank gauge is the same gauge as the RA model with the exception of the aluminum float. This gauge includes a Type 316 stainless steel float which stands up to a variety of chemicals. The #20RS Tokheim Kit of parts consists of 12" diameter welded 316 stainless steel float, stainless steel measuring tape (graduated in feet, inches, and eighths), housings, elbows, reading section, base, counterweight, tank clamps, brackets, and essential fittings. Light weight aluminum parts save shipping costs and make gauges much easier to install. Detailed instructions for installing are included with each shipment. Standard pipe and installing not included. When ordering specify liquid stored.

12" diameter welded 316 SS float and 316 SS measuring tape (graduated in feet, inches and eighths). Aluminum housings, elbows, reading section, base, counterweight, tank clamps, brackets and essential fittings. Standard pipe not included.

The SSB model tank gauge is a special gauge, comes with cast iron housings, instead of aluminum, and all internal parts are Type 316 stainless steel. This gauge is recommended for the food and beverage industry, water treatment plants, sanitation plants and corrosive liquids. The Tokheim #20SSB Kit of parts consists of Type 316 stainless steel tape (graduated in feet, inches, and eighths), 12" diameter welded Type 316 stainless steel float, stainless steel pulleys and internal parts, iron housings, elbows, reading section, base, counterweight, brackets, tank clamps, and essential fittings. Detailed instructions for installing are included with each shipment. Standard pipe and installing not included. When ordering specify liquid stored.

TOKHEIM FLOATS USED IN "LOW CONDUCTIVITY FLUIDS" MUST HAVE A "GROUND BONDING STRAP" ADDED, PLEASE REVIEW ALL NEW AND EXISTING APPLICATIONS. ORDER TOKHEIM PART NUMBER "20 LVF-GROUND STRAP".

Use caution when using Tokheim Gauging equipment with "Low Volatitlity Fluids".

REVIEW THE SAFETY VIDEO AND SAFETY DATA LISTED BELOW.
